I re-read what I wrote and it was garbage. Let me try again.

We have a Cla=
sspathWalker that generates events that some ClasspathwalkerListener consum=
es and operates on.

I suggest testing each of these behaviors in isolation=
.

* The ClasspathWalker correctly walks the classpath.
* The ClasspathWalk=
er correctly generates events as it walks the classpath.
* The ClasspathWal=
kerListener correctly handles the various kinds of ClasspathWalker events

=
To test the first and second behavior, mock the classpath. To test the thir=
d behavior, simply create events and send them to the listener. No mocking =
required.

That was what I was trying to say. I hope this is clearer and ac=
tually makes sense.

Tae care.
